message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to consider that?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $8200. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $7000? It's the lowest I can go and still make this purchase worthwhile for me.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $8000, which is my minimum price. It's the best I can do, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
